articles.description: "I see no point in going to the World Championships and jumping 2.16 or 2.20m and coming back empty-handed. I would rather prepare for the Asian Games because I have a realistic chance of a medal there," said Tejaswin.
articles.content:
Tejaswin Shankar will not be competing at the 2023 World Athletics Championships, set to begin in Budapest on August 17.
While he has qualified for the men's high jump at the Worlds, he's in tune wi… [+5262 chars]

articles.author: NDTV Sports Desk
articles.title: On Jasprit Bumrah's Return After 11 Months, Glenn McGrath Gives Honest Verdict - NDTV Sports
articles.description: Jasprit Bumrah will be playing for India in the Ireland T20I series later this month.
articles.content: India's marquee pacer Jasprit Bumrah is all set to don the national team's jersey again, having been selected for the T20I tour of Ireland. Bumrah, who has been out of action for nearly a year, will … [+1944 chars]
